description: Non-essential shops will be closed with travel only allowed for work, health and emergency reasons.
title: Covid: Italy latest European country to order Christmas lockdown
title_page: Covid: Italy latest European country to order Christmas lockdown - BBC News
maintext: Sweden has recommended wearing face masks on public transport during the rush hour, reversing its earlier guidance. It will also cut from the current eight to four per table the number of people sitting together in restaurants, and ban alcohol sales after 20:00.
